text: Hooper is a 1978 American action comedy movie directed by Hal Needham and starring Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jan-Michael Vincent, Brian Keith, Robert Klein, John Marley, James Best. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1979. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1978 action movies Category:1978 comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Hal Needham Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Hooper (movie)
